calculate_ratio_of_areas_and_volumes.code:
def calculate_ratio_of_areas_and_volumes(area_large_cone, volume_large_cone, area_small_cone, volume_small_cone):
    ratio_area = area_small_cone / (area_large_cone - area_small_cone)
    ratio_volume = volume_small_cone / (volume_large_cone - volume_small_cone)
    return ratio_area, ratio_volume
